about.title: I am Franco Galluccio
about.subtitle: I am a Full Stack Web Developer
about.description01: I am a highly motivated professional, with demonstrated skills in proactivity, responsibility and teamwork. I stand out for my ability to quickly adapt to new environments and face challenges with creativity and determination. My commitment to excellence leads me to deliver high-quality results and consistently meet deadlines.
about.description02: Additionally, I have strong communication and collaboration skills, allowing me to work effectively with colleagues and clients. I am always willing to learn and contribute positively to the team's success.

services.description01: Solutions based on creative designs. I transform ideas into captivating visual experiences, combining innovation and aesthetics to capture the client's full attention.
services.description02: I take your brand to new levels, creating distinctive identities that reflect the essence of the business, helping you stand out and connect with your audience in an authentic way.
services.description03: I improve interaction with elegant and functional user interfaces, designing intuitive experiences that facilitate navigation, ensuring fluidity and attractiveness.
services.description04: I put the user at the center of everything I do. My user experience service focuses on creating smooth, immersive journeys that make users feel valued and understood.
services.description05: Quality and clarity are the foundation of my code. By offering a clean code service, you can rely on robust, secure and scalable solutions that will drive your project forward in the long term.
services.description06: Fast, efficient support is just a click away. My responsibility for potential technical issues ensures you always have the support you need to keep business running.

projects.description01: Online store for a brewery built with React, Context, and Material UI. Fully responsive and user-friendly for browsing and purchasing craft beers.
projects.description02: Institutional landing page built with Next.js and SASS, based on a Figma design. Fully responsive with a clean and professional look.
projects.description03: Landing page made with Next.js and Typescript, styled with SASS. Offers an interactive layout that highlights key service benefits.
projects.description04: Full Stack e-commerce for a burger chain with user, product, and role management. Backend in Express.js and MongoDB using layered architecture.
projects.description05: CRM for managing users and QR codes linked to pet data. Scanning a badge QR leads to a custom pet landing. Built with Next.js and Express.js.
projects.description06: Mobile app with React Native, Redux Toolkit, and Firebase. Supports geolocation, image upload, authentication, and real-time state management.
projects.description07: Business solution to manage critical data and processes. Centralizes financial operations and tracks financing requests in real time.
projects.description08: Helpdesk-style tool to manage maintenance tasks. Create, assign, and track orders in real time, with built-in chat between users and staff.

resume.description01: Tertiary-level program focused on practical software development, covering programming languages, databases, logic, and agile methodologies.
resume.description02: Training with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), plus Git, Docker, and cloud tools. Emphasis on teamwork and agile practices.
resume.description03: High school program focused on biology, chemistry, and physics, providing a strong foundation in scientific thinking and natural phenomena.
